Trinity::

She got picked up and looked at his face."I won't get hurt. I'm a 
tough predacon warrior. I'll be alright.  Don't worry."  She smiled. 
She really had little fear of most things simply because she had no 
understanding of war or the dangers involved. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He runs in front of Trinity and tries to pick her up in his 
arms.  At the 
> same time he says "you can't wander off like that.  What would I do 
if you 
> got hurt?  Or worse?"
